document_data.name: Trebbe
document_data.mainbody: '''Trebbe''' was an [[archwizard]] and one of the most prolific spell creators in [[Netheril]].
document_data.Abilities: He was a specialist in magic that protected arcanists, enabling spell duels to last much longer.

History.Death: In {{Yearlink|-2237}}, a spellcasting accident triggered while Trebbe was working on the crown led to his death.
